Package cams.camp

Class CampController

java.lang.Object
cams.camp.CampController
public class CampController extends Object
The CampController class manages camps and provides functionality for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting camps.
Since:
2023-11-09
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gillbert Susilo Wong, Juan Frederick, Karl Devlin Chau, Pascalis Pandey, Trang Nguyen

    • getInstance

      the CampController instance

    • getInstance

      public static CampController getInstance(String campPath)
      Returns the singleton instance of the CampController.
      Parameters:
      campPath - the path where csv file of camp list is found
      Returns:
      the CampController instance

    • close

      public static void close()
      Closes the current camp controller and serializes the current camp data an Excel file.

    • getCampTable

      public Map<String,Camp> getCampTable()
      Retrieves the whole camp table.
      Returns:
      The camp table Map containing all created camps

    • createCamp

      public void createCamp(String campName, String location, String description, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, LocalDate registrationDeadline, int totalSlots, boolean isVisible, String userGroup, Staff staffInCharge) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a new camp and adds it to the camp table.
      Parameters:
      campName - the name of the camp
      location - the location of the camp
      description - the description of the camp
      startDate - the start date of the camp
      endDate - the end date of the camp
      registrationDeadline - the registration deadline for the camp
      totalSlots - the total available slots for the camp
      isVisible - indicates whether the camp is visible
      userGroup - the user group associated with the camp
      staffInCharge - the staff in charge of the camp
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • createCamp

      public void createCamp(Camp newCamp)
      Adds a new camp to the camp table.
      Parameters:
      newCamp - the new camp to be added

    • getAllCamps

      public List<Camp> getAllCamps()
      Retrieves an array of all camps in the camp table.
      Returns:
      a list of Camp objects

    • getCamp

      public Camp getCamp(String name)
      Retrieves a specific camp by name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the camp to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Camp object with the specified name, or null if not found

    • deleteCamp

      public void deleteCamp(String name) throws RuntimeException
      Deletes a camp with the specified name from the camp table.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the camp to delete
      Throws:
      RuntimeException

    • getPerformanceReport

      public Map<Student,Integer> getPerformanceReport(String campName)
      Gets a performance report for all students in the camps.
      Parameters:
      campName - name of the camp to obtain the performance report from
      Returns:
      a Map containing the performance report

    • getAttendanceList

      public List<Student> getAttendanceList(String campName)
      Gets the attendance list for all students in the camps.
      Parameters:
      campName - name of the camp to obtain the attendance list from
      Returns:
      a Set containing the attendance list

    • getCurrentCamp

      public Camp getCurrentCamp()
      Gets the current camp of the camp controller.
      Returns:
      the current Camp set for the controller

    • setCurrentCamp

      public void setCurrentCamp(Camp camp)
      Sets the current camp of the camp controller.
      Parameters:
      camp - the Camp to be set as the current camp of the controller
